content: 1 3 2 1 5-st repeat 10-st to 2-st repeat p 06 blue sky fibers embroidery leaves use a branches are accented with lazy daisy stitch french knots a b c a 1 bring needle up at a b a 2 insert needle into same hole a 3 pull needle through to ws leaving a loop on the rs 1 bring needle up at a 4 bring needle up at b inside the loop 2 wrap thread lightly twice around needle 5 insert needle at c 3 insert needle into b very close to a 6 pull needle through to ws and pull stitch flat 4 pull wraps tight around needle next to fabric 5 hold wraps against fabric with thumb and push needle through to ws stems and branches use a split stitch flowers use clusters of straight stitches b a c b a 1 bring needle up at a 2 insert needle at b 1 bring needle up at a 3 pull needle through to ws and pull stitch flat 2 insert needle at b 4 bring needle up at c splitting stitch a-b in 3 pull needle through to ws and pull stitch the center flat 5 continue making a smooth row of flat stitches copyright ©2026 blue sky fibers blueskyfibers com this pattern is copyrighted material and under the copyright laws of the united states you may use this pattern for your own personal use or enjoyment but may not edit publish copy or commercially exploit this pattern in any way 02012026 p 08
